definition: paper/CL:張|张[zhang1],沓[da2]/classifier for documents, letter etc

sentences.english: The RTP condition of fluorene and acenaphthene on the bonded filter paper was examined in detail.
sentences.chinese: 詳細的考察了芴和苊在修飾濾紙上室溫磷光條件。

sentences.english: Cartridge filter coated handle, making the surface dust off completely, long service life.
sentences.chinese: 濾筒濾紙覆膜處理，使得表面脫灰徹底，使用壽命長。

sentences.english: " said Linda Higgins, throwing a sopping brown coffee filter into the garbage can.
sentences.chinese: 辛吉斯問他，順手把用過的咖啡濾紙扔進了垃圾筒。

sentences.english: The coffee filters through this special paper.
sentences.chinese: 咖啡通過這張特殊的濾紙得到過濾。

sentences.english: What remains in the filter is a mixture of various metals and impurities.
sentences.chinese: 留在濾紙裏的是多種金屬和雜質的混合物。

sentences.english: Fourth, the plantlet having been contaminated could be saved by rooting in filter-paper bridge outside the bottle.
sentences.chinese: 第四，已污染的組培苗採用濾紙橋瓶外生根法挽救。

sentences.english: An advantage of Andrea is that it requires no disposable filters.
sentences.chinese: 安德里亞的一個優點是，它不需要一次性過濾紙。

sentences.english: Due to the low residue, little impurity, the quantitative filter had the best color grade.
sentences.chinese: 定量濾紙灰份低，雜質少，顯色效果好。

sentences.english: To manufacture the filter paper of cooking oil with sepiolite is studied in the second section.
sentences.chinese: 論文第二部分利用海泡石製作食用油過濾紙。

sentences.english: This paper point out the new development trend of engine air filter paper - lower basisweight.
sentences.chinese: 闡明瞭內燃機空氣過濾紙的低定量化發展方向。

sentences.english: In X-ray fluorescence, pieces of the filter are used directly.
sentences.chinese: 在X射線熒光法中，可直接使用濾紙。

sentences.english: The double filter paper bed was preferable considering the experimentation effect in laboratory.
sentences.chinese: 在實驗室條件下，採用雙層濾紙牀進行發芽試驗較好。

sentences.english: Artemisia annua have a good antibacterial activity, this research mensurated the antiseptic activity of Artemisia annua to mold with the filter paper method.
sentences.chinese: 應用濾紙片法測定了黃花蒿對黴菌的抑制活性。

sentences.english: The market of filter paper used for automobile in China was analyzed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 分析了我國汽車發動機用過濾紙的市場發展概況。

definition: to reconstitute (a powdered beverage) by adding water, milk etc
